values.description: Array of values for the parameters. Must have the same size as 'parameters'.

items.description: Value for a parameter. The value must usually be consistent with default SI units used in GODOT.

sria.description: Packed upper triangular SRI array (column-major order) for the given 'parameters of size (N+1)*(N+2)/2 where N is the parameter vector size.

items.description: Matrix element. The value must be consistent with default SI units used in GODOT.
